simplesect.para: NRF_TEMP_HAS_CALIBRATION Symbol indicating whether the calibration of temperature measurement is present.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_TEMP_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_temp_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified TEMP interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if the interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the TEMP interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_int_enable Function for enabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_temp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_int_disable Function for disabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_temp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_temp_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.
nrf_temp_task_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified TEMP task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Requested task.

simplesect.para: Address of the requested task register.
nrf_temp_task_trigger Function for activating the specified TEMP task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be activated.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_event_address_get Function for getting the address of the specified TEMP event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Requested event.

simplesect.para: Address of the requested event register.
nrf_temp_event_clear Function for clearing the specified TEMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_event_check Function for getting the state of a specific event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_result_get Function for getting the result of temperature measurement.
Returned value is in 2's complement format, 0.25 °C steps

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Temperature value register contents.
nrf_temp_calibration_coeff_set Function for setting the calibration coefficient for the temperature measurement.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Calibration coefficient.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_calibration_coeff_get Function for getting the calibration coefficient for the temperature measurement.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Calibration coefficient.
nrf_temp_subscribe_set Function for setting the subscribe configuration for a given TEMP task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_subscribe_clear Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given TEMP task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_publish_set Function for setting the publish configuration for a given TEMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

simplesect.para: nrf_temp_publish_clear Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given TEMP event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.
